name: FORCE: Extended
description:
This is the main project for the FORCE series. Previous installments were created for game jams, but this time, FORCE: Extended is an ongoing project. Stay tuned for updates!

FORCE Extended is a 2-4 player arena-style fighting game in which you can only kill your opponents by using the environment to your advantage. There are many ways to die, including by your own hand. Use your character's unique abilities to battle against your friends and determine the ultimate winner. No one is safe, ever! Methods of death include:

  • Walls break and become deadly
  • Lasers and other fun objects will push you into deadly things
  • Rocks are deadly and break walls
  • And more fun surprises!

To play, you will need at least one friend, one controller per player, and a Windows PC.  Extract the FORCE 2 folder containing the executable and data.win file. Both are necessary to run the game! Make sure they're saved in the same directory. 

Gamemodes Include:

  • Classic - simple arena with spike walls, from the original FORCE games.
  • Bladed Fury- Classic + Sawblades
  • Spike Ball - Classic + a persistent spikey rock that doesn't get destroyed
  • Death Wave - Classic + turrets on the walls that shoot mini spike balls periodically.

Playable Characters Include:

  • Bahm - drops bombs which explode after a few seconds and create shrapnel, along with dealing knockback.
  • Layzur - deploys a rotating laser which shoves players on contact, disappears after some time.
  • Spyk - grows spikes and can attach to other characters to lead them to death.
  • Rahk - launches a spikey rock, which bounces off walls (and damages them in the process). It is destroyed when it hits a fully broken wall.
  • Boomer - explodes and applies knockback to anyone in range.
  • Rang - Throws a boomerang that knocks players around and breaks walls
  • Gunnee - shoots fast and deadly rock bullets that break walls

Have fun!
